professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator/Developer with expertise in SQL Server administration, high-availability solutions (AlwaysOn), disaster recovery, and security measures such as Transparent Data Encryption. Proficient in utilizing tools like SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS), SolarWinds, and JIRA for database management and monitoring.

key_responsibilities: Administered SQL Server instances across multiple environments
Implemented high-availability solutions using AlwaysOn to minimize downtime.
Performed regular database backups and disaster recovery operations to ensure data integrity.
Migrated and optimized large-scale SQL Server databases to improve query performance.
Configured replication and mirroring solutions for data redundancy.
Monitored and resolved issues related to database locks
Developed and deployed ETL processes using SSIS for data integration.
Secured sensitive data using Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) and column-level security.
Collaborated with application teams to optimize database performance and resolve production issues.

technical_skills:
SQL Server Administration",
            "High-availability Solutions (AlwaysOn)",
            "Disaster Recovery Planning",
            "Database Security (TDE, Column-level Security)",
            "ETL Processes (SSIS)",
            "Database Performance Optimization
tools_and_software:
SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS)",
            "SolarWinds Database Performance Monitor",
            "JIRA for Issue Tracking and Project Management",
            "Visual Studio for Development and Debugging",
            "VMware for Virtual Environment Administration
